headline: EDWARDS DIFFSTAK 160 CRYO-COOLED PUMP
keywords: diffusion vacuum pumps diff pumps  diff pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Diffusion Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Edwards
Model CR160/700P
Inlet Flange ISO-K 160.0 mm (6.299 in)
Foreline Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Pumping Speed Nitrogen 600.0 l/s (1,271.5 CFM)
Ultimate Pressure 2.25E-9(En) torr (3.00E-9 mbar)
Fluid Charge 0.60 L (0.16 gal, 0.13 Br gal)
Cooling Water Required Minimum Flow: 0.50 GPM (1.90 l/m) Minimum Temperature: 20 ºC (68 ºF, 293.00 ºK)
Water Connection 10mm compression couplings
Accessories Typical Applications Include:
  • Coating
  • E-beam welding
  • Leak detection
  • Mass spectrometry
  • Degassing
  • Lamp and tube evacuation
  • Cryostat pumpdown
  • Vacuum ovens

    Pneumatically operated inlet baffle

Other Information Pumping speed for water vapor: 2000 l/s
Liquid nitrogen charge of 7.73 liters, lasting for 18 hours
Pneumatic connections: 6mm x 1/4"BSP male
Pneumatic actuating pressure: 2.4-6.9 mbar
Additional info through this link: and here too
Power Requirements 110 V 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 25.000 in (63.5 cm)
Height 30.000 in (76.2 cm)
Weight 60 lb (27 kg)
